mutants.code:
def eliminate_children(n, k, a):
    nums = list(range(1, n + 1))
    leader = 1
    elims = []
    for i in range(k):
        elim = (leader + a[i]) % len(nums)
        elims.append(nums.pop(elim))
        leader = elim % len(nums)
    return elims

def eliminate_children(n, k, a):
    nums = list(range(1, n + 1))
    leader = -1
    elims = []
    for i in range(k):
        elim = (leader + a[i]) % len(nums)
        elims.append(nums.pop(elim))
        leader = elim % len(nums)
    return elims

def eliminate_children(n, k, a):
    nums = list(range(1, n + 1))
    leader = 0
    elims = []
    for i in range(k):
        elim = (leader - a[i]) % len(nums)
        elims.append(nums.pop(elim))
        leader = elim % len(nums)
    return elims
